title: Stats Leaders: Selecting Stats Leaders menu item opens Stats Leaders section
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected More
And we have selected Stats Leaders
custom_expected: Then the Stats Leaders page opens

title: Stats Leaders: Selecting Back returns us to the More section
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the More menu
And we have selected Stats Leaders
custom_steps: When the Back button is tapped
custom_expected: Then the More section will be visible

title: Stats Leaders: "Could Not Load Data" message displays when a data connection is lost
custom_preconds:
Given we have lost our Data Connection
And we have selected the More menu
And we have selected Stats Leaders
custom_expected: Then a "Could Not Load Data" message will appear

title: Stats Leaders: A loading spinner will appear for every setting change and/or transition
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the More menu
And we have selected Stats Leaders
custom_expected: Then the spinner should be visible during the transition

title: Stats Leaders (Individual): "Player Stats" loads initially when selecting "Stats Leaders"
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the More menu
And we have selected Stats Leaders
custom_expected: Then Player Stats will load initially

title: Stats Leaders (Individual): When swiping the main screen we will change between Batting and Pitching
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the More menu
And we have selected Stats Leaders
custom_steps:
When we swipe the initial screen to the right
Or we swipe the initial screen to the left
custom_expected: Then we will change between Batting & Pitching

title: Stats Leaders (Individual): Batting displays the correct categories of AVG, HR, RBI, R, SB, OBP & OPS
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the More menu
And we have selected Stats Leaders
And Batting is displayed
custom_expected: Then the following categories will be visible: AVG, HR, RBI, R, SB, OBP & OPS

title: Stats Leaders (Individual): Pitching displays the correct categories of ERA, W, SO, SV, WHIP, CG & L
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the More menu
And we have selected Stats Leaders
And Pitching is displayed
custom_expected: Then the following categories will be visible: ERA, W, SO, SV, WHIP, CG & L

title: Stats Leaders (Individual): Tapping each individual stat opens up the correct list of leaders for that particular stat
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the More menu
And we have selected Stats Leaders
custom_steps: Then tap an individual stat button
custom_expected:
Then a list of leaders for that particular stat will display accurately

REPEAT for each Individual Stat Button

title: Stats Leaders (Individual): A list of at least 20 players will be displayed when selecting an Individual Stat in the Regular Season
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the More menu
And we have selected Stats Leaders
And we have selected an Individual Stat
And we are set to Regular season
custom_expected: Then a list of 20 players will be returned initially from best to worst for that particular stat

title: Stats Leaders (Individual): Scrolling to the bottom of the initial 20 players listed will automatically load the next 20 players until all players have been listed
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the More menu
And we have selected Stats Leaders
And we have selected an Individual Stat
And we are set to Regular season
custom_steps: When scrolling to the bottom of the initial 20 players
custom_expected: Then the next 20 players will be listed

title: Stats Leaders (Individual): The main view for Stats Leader will show "x" tied if there are multiple leaders for a particular individual stat
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the More menu
And we have selected Stats Leaders
And we have found an Individual Stat with multiple people tied
custom_expected: Then the Individual Stat will display "x" tied

title: Stats Leaders (Individual): When selecting an individual stat that has multiple players tied they will be listed with the same number
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the More menu
And we have selected Stats Leaders
And we have selected an Individual Stat with multiple players tied at a certain position
custom_expected: Then each player tied will have the same position number to the left of their name

title: Stats Leaders (Individual): When selecting an individual stat that has multiple players tied the next position after the tied players will be however many spots after the tied individuals
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the More menu
And we have selected Stats Leaders
And we have selected an Individual Stat with multiple players tied at a certain position
custom_expected: Then the next position after the tied players will start at "x" after where "x" is the number of players that were tied.

title: Stats Leaders (Individual): When switching the various filters ensure that the stats filter correctly
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the More menu
And we have selected Stats Leaders
custom_expected:
Then ensure the filter has filtered correctly

REPEAT for each Filter

title: Stats Leaders (Individual): When selecting an Individual Stat and setting a filter it is then properly displayed above the list of players
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the More menu
And we have selected Stats Leaders
And we have selected an Individual Stat
And we have set a filter
custom_expected: Then the filter is displayed properly above the list of players

title: Stats Leaders (Team): When selecting Player Stats we will have the ability to switch the filter to Team Totals
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the More menu
And we have selected Stats Leaders
custom_expected: Then Team Totals is selectable

title: Stats Leaders (Team): When selecting Team Totals the main view is updated to show teams
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the More menu
And we have selected Stats Leaders
And we have changed Player Stats to Team Totals
custom_expected: Then Team Totals are properly displayed in the main view

title: Stats Leaders (Team): Batting displays the correct categories of AVG, HR, RBI, R, SB, OBP & OPS
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the More menu
And we have selected Stats Leaders
And we have selected Team Totals
And Batting is displayed
custom_expected: Then the following categories will be visible: AVG, HR, RBI, R, SB, OBP & OPS

title: Stats Leaders (Team): Pitching displays the correct categories of ERA, W, SO, SV, WHIP, CG & L
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the More menu
And we have selected Stats Leaders
And we have selected Team Totals
And Pitching is displayed
custom_expected: Then the following categories will be visible: ERA, W, SO, SV, WHIP, CG & L

title: Stats Leaders (Team): Tapping each individual stat opens up the correct list of leaders for that particular stat
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the More menu
And we have selected the Team Totals filter
And we have selected Stats Leaders
custom_steps: Then tap an individual stat button
custom_expected:
Then a list of leaders for that particular stat will display accurately

REPEAT for each Individual Stat Button

title: Stats Leaders (Team): A list of at least 20 teams will be displayed when selecting an Individual Stat in the Regular Season
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the More menu
And we have selected Stats Leaders
And we have set the filter to Team Totals
And we have selected an Individual Stat
And we are set to Regular Season
custom_expected: Then a list of 16 teams will be returned initially from best to worst for that particular stat

title: Stats Leaders (Team): The main view for Stats Leaders will show "x" tied if there are multiple leaders for a particular individual stat
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the More menu
And we have selected Stats Leaders
And we have set the filter to Team Totals
And we have found an Individual Stat with multiple teams tied
custom_expected: Then the Individual Stat will display "x" tied

title: Stats Leaders (Team): When selecting an individual stat that has multiple teams tied they will be listed with the same number
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the More menu
And we have selected Stats Leaders
And we have selected an Individual Stat with multiple teams tied at a certain position
custom_expected: Then each team will ave the same position number to the left of their name

title: Stats Leaders (Team): When selecting an individual stat that has multiple teams tied the next position after the tied teams will be however many spots after the tied teams
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the More menu
And we have selected Stats Leaders
And we have selected an Individual Stat with multiple teams tied at a certain position
custom_expected: Then the next position after the tied teams will start at "x" after where "x" is the number of teams that were tied.

title: Stats Leaders (Team): When switching the various filters ensure that the stats filter correctly
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the More menu
And we have selected Stats Leaders
custom_expected:
Then ensure the filter has filtered correctly

REPEAT for each Filter

title: Stats Leaders (Team): When selecting an Individual Stat and setting a filter it is then properly displayed above the list of teams
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the More menu
And we have selected Stats Leaders
And we have selected an Individual Stat
And we have set a filter
custom_expected: Then the filter is displayed properly above the list of teams
